tips.zh: 如果你只想快速浏览结构，可以先选择较轻量的分析选项，进入后再按需深入。
tips.en: If you only need a quick overview, start with a lighter analysis mode and dive deeper later.

tips.zh: 分析期间日志会持续更新，出现 WARN/ERR 时可以优先定位对应命令。
tips.en: Logs update continuously during analysis. If you see WARN/ERR, check the related command first.

tips.zh: 大文件分析可能较慢，保持应用前台可减少被系统回收的概率。
tips.en: Large file analysis can be slow; keeping the app in foreground reduces the chance of being killed.

tips.zh: 进入项目后可按模块进行局部分析，通常比一次性全量分析更高效。
tips.en: After entering the project, analyzing specific modules is often more efficient than all-at-once full analysis.
